RT @BradBiggs: The flip of a coin signaled a change in approach for Matt Nagy. The #Bears won the coin toss for the 25th time under the coach. For the first time, he took the ball.

Philosophical change? New strategy? It was a bold offensive showing after a 3-and-punt.
